name: Kornit Digital Ltd.
description: Kornit Digital Ltd. is a leading provider of digital textile printing technologies, specializing in sustainable and efficient solutions for the fashion and apparel industries. Established in 2002 and headquartered in Israel, Kornit has revolutionized the digital printing landscape with its innovative technologies that empower brands to produce high-quality, customized designs rapidly and sustainably. The company offers a diverse range of products, including its industry-leading direct-to-garment (DTG) printers, which enable businesses to print directly onto garments with vivid colors and intricate designs, reducing waste and improving efficiency compared to traditional printing methods. Kornit's commitment to sustainability is reflected in its eco-friendly inks and processes, which are designed to minimize environmental impact, making it a preferred choice for brands looking to enhance their green credentials. Furthermore, Kornit provides comprehensive software solutions that facilitate the design, production, and management of digital printing workflows, ensuring seamless integration into existing manufacturing processes. With a growing presence in global markets and partnerships with major brands, Kornit Digital is at the forefront of transforming the textile industry into a more sustainable and responsive sector, meeting the demands of modern consumers for customization and speed.
